category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 19 (Culture Committee)
contents: Article 19 (Culture Committee) The Culture Committee responds to the chairman's advice on the following matters. Revised 2019. 1. 31. 2023. 7. 5. 1. Matters pertaining to cultural and artistic events organized by the International Olympic Committee (IOC), the Olympic Council of Asia (OCA) and similar international organizations 2. Promotion of sports values ​​in Korea Matters pertaining to the operation of cultural and artistic events to spread and promote the Olympic movement 3. Deleted July 5, 4, 2023. Matters pertaining to exchanges with the International Olympic Academy (IOA) and National Olympic Academies (NOAs) 5. Olympic ideals and Matters related to the establishment, operation and promotion of regular educational courses for the dissemination of the Olympic movement 6. Other matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Cultural Committee and submitted by the Chairman [This article was newly established on April 3, 2017]
